NavCanvas in Splitterwindow

In general, you can put fc.NavCanvas (or fc.FloatCanvas) into any kind of other window, including dialogs etc.. This demo shows how to put the NavCanvas into a wx.SplitterWindow as an example.

This is the same as the simple example in the Getting started part of the tutorial. Except the NavCanvas is now put onto the right side of a wx.SplitterWindow.
